section.title: CloudForms Management Engine Categories and Tags
section.para: To facilitate the deployment of OpenShift Enterprise, create the OSE Policy and OSE Status tag categories if they do not already exist on your system.

step.para: In the Object Details field, select Request in the /System/Process/ list.
Enter create in the Message field.
Enter osetags in the Request field.
In the Object Attribute field, select None in the Type list.
In the Simulation Parameters field, select Execute Methods.

section.para: The OSE Policy and OSE Status categories and tags are automatically created. The automation.log file displays creation progress.
